summary: A teenager turns her babysitting service into a call-girl service for married guys after fooling around with one of her customers.
cast: Lauren Birkell|Paul Borghese|Chira Cassel|Anthony Cirillo|Spencer Treat Clark|Andy Comeau|Ann Dowd|Jason Dubin|Harold Fort|Alexie Gilmore|Halley Wegryn Gross|Michael Knowles|Louisa Krause|Adam LeFevre|Alexandra Daddario|John Leguizamo|Jake Melman|Sydney Melman|Sergio Mendoza Sr.|Cynthia Nixon|Denis O'Hare|Jansen Panettiere|Jay Patterson|Ali Phillips|Ethan Phillips|Andi Potamkin|Bridget Regan|Jessica Sandler|Kim Shaw|Nancy St. Alban|Katherine Waterston|Paul Woodburn|Michael Yavnielli|Nicole Berger|Kyle Fischbach|Brigitte Hagerman|Raquel Jordan|Eric Nelsen|Justin Restivo|Tyler Shamy|Jenna Rose Simon|Lara Theodos
title: The Babysitters: Las niñeras
